name: sharifyr_server_router
description: websocket and webrtc router for broadcasting contact statuses and bootstrapping peer connections

scripts.local:watch: npm run build && npm run lint && cat ./tslint.err && npm run build && node --inspect ./dist/src/index.js
scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=TEST && nyc --extension .ts --extension .tsx mocha --timeout 10000 -r ts-node/register ./test/*.ts && nyc report --reporter text-lcov --extension .ts --extension .tsx | coveralls

author: Kyle Galvin
